Description: Implement and enforce secure coding standards across all development activities
Implement comprehensive input validation and data sanitization mechanisms
Notes: Validate all user inputs and sanitize data

Description: Implement strong authentication and authorization mechanisms
Notes: Use multi-factor authentication and proper access controls

Description: Implement data encryption for sensitive data at rest and in transit
Notes: Encrypt sensitive data using industry-standard algorithms

Description: Implement secure error handling and logging mechanisms
Notes: Prevent information disclosure through error messages

Description: Implement secure session management and timeout controls
Notes: Use secure session tokens and proper timeout

Description: Secure all APIs with proper authentication and rate limiting
Audit and secure all third-party dependencies and libraries
Implement secure configuration management practices
Notes: Secure all configuration files and settings

Description: Implement comprehensive security logging and monitoring
Notes: Log all security events and monitor for threats

Description: Establish and maintain security-focused code review process
Implement automated static code analysis tools
Notes: Use SAST tools for vulnerability detection

Description: Implement dynamic application security testing
Notes: Use DAST tools for runtime testing

Description: Conduct regular penetration testing of applications
Establish vulnerability management and remediation process
Develop and implement security training for development teams
Develop and test security incident response procedures
Document security compliance and audit requirements
Conduct regular security architecture reviews
Implement threat modeling for all applications
Automate security testing in CI/CD pipeline
Notes: Integrate security testing in development pipeline

Description: Implement secure development lifecycle (SDLC) process
Establish security metrics and key performance indicators
Integrate security tools into development environment
Establish security communication and reporting procedures
